title: 2009/947/EC: Council Decision of 30 November 2009 on the conclusion of the Agreement between the European Community and the Government of the Republic of Azerbaijan on certain aspects of air services
header:
15.12.2009 EN Official Journal of the European Union L 328/39
COUNCIL DECISION
of 30 November 2009
on the conclusion of the Agreement between the European Community and the Government of the Republic of Azerbaijan on certain aspects of air services
(2009/947/EC)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN UNION
main_body: The Agreement between the European Community and the Government of the Republic of Azerbaijan on certain aspects of air services is hereby approved on behalf of the Community.
The President of the Council is hereby authorised to designate the person(s) empowered to make the notification provided in Article 8(1) of the Agreement.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 30 November 2009.
For the Council
The President
B. ASK
(1)  Opinion of 25 October 2005 (OJ C 272 E, 9.11.2006, p. 56).
(2)  OJ L 265, 9.10.2009, p. 25.
(3)  OJ L 265, 9.10.2009, p. 24.
